scripts.build:mac: npm run pre:build && electron-builder build --mac --config build/config.js
scripts.build:win: npm run pre:build && electron-builder build --win --config build/config.js
scripts.build:linux: npm run pre:build && electron-builder build --linux --config build/config.js
scripts.deploy:prod: git branch -f release/production master && git push --force origin release/production
